exception tablesalt.common.io.hdf.DataSetError(missing_sets)¶

Bases: ValueError

ValueError that raises when file in the filepath passed to the RejsekortStore does not contain the correct datasets

tablesalt.common.io.storereader module¶

Module containg StoreReader class to read datasets from the Rejsekort datasets that are created from the csv zipfile delivered by rejsedata

class tablesalt.common.io.storereader.StoreReader(filepath: str, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

A reader class to load rejsekort data.

Uses h5 and msgpack files from the rejsekort datastores

static bad_keys(stop_info: numpy.ndarray) → Set[int]¶

Determine the bad tripkeys. Trips that don’t have FiCo etc

Parameters

stop_info (np.ndarray) – the stop_information dataset in the h5 file.

Returns

a set of tripkeys to discard

Return type

Set[int]

get_data(dset: str, **kwargs) → Union[numpy.ndarray, Dict[int, Any]]¶

Get the requested data from the datastore.

Parameters

  • dset (str) – the dataset to load from the h5 file.

  • **kwargs –

    the filter kwargs: [‘startswith’, ‘endswith’,

    ’remove_bad_trips’, ‘hour’, ‘weekday’, ‘month’, ‘passenger_type’, ‘passenger_total’]

Raises

ValueError – if the dset argument is not one of [‘stops’, ‘price’, ‘time’, ‘pas’, ‘passengers’, ‘contractor’]

Returns

array statisfiying conditions np.ndarray/dict(if dset==’contractor’)

Return type

TYPE

static total_passengers(pas_info: numpy.ndarray) → Dict[int, int]¶

Make a dictionary of keys as trip keys and values as the total number of passengers on the trip

Parameters

pas_info (np.ndarray) – passenger_info dataset

Returns

a dictionary of trip keys and corresponding sum of all passengers.

Return type

Dict[int, int]
